title: Lumma Stealer Leverages Browser Fingerprinting for Data Theft and Stealthy C2 Communications

content.raw: Following the doxxing of Lumma Stealer’s alleged core members last month, the notorious infostealer initially experienced a significant decline in activity as customers migrated to rival platforms like Vidar and StealC. However, recent telemetry data reveals a concerning resurgence of Lumma Stealer operations beginning the week of October 20, 2025, accompanied by sophisticated new capabilities […] The post Lumma Stealer Leverages Browser Fingerprinting for Data Theft and Stealthy C2 Communications appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
